TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerSerializationManager extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager, class System.IServiceProvider
Public Class DesignerSerializationManager Implements IDesignerSerializationManager, IServiceProvider
type DesignerSerializationManager = class interface IDesignerSerializationManager interface IServiceProvider

summary.span: 提供 接口的实现。

span.span: Provides an implementation of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口旨在作为控制序列化的对象的格式无关接口。The interface is designed to be a format-independent interface to an object that controls serialization. 它实质上是向序列化程序提供上下文和服务, 实际上执行反序列化。It essentially provides context and services to serializers, which actually perform the deserialization. 通过跟踪对象, 有助于反序列化过程。 assists in the deserialization process by keeping track of objects. 这在技术上与接口类似: 设计人员实际提供用户界面 (UI), 并提供允许不同设计器一起工作的粘附。This is similar in technique to the interface: designers actually provide the user interface (UI), and provides the glue that allows different designers to work together. 类实现 。The class implements . 它旨在提供类似于运行时序列化程序的一般形式的反序列化。It is designed to provide a generic form of deserialization that is similar to run-time serializers like the . 类实现了三个目标:The class achieves three goals: - 它是一个简单的全包式对象, 可用于反序列化各种格式。It is a simple, turnkey object that can be used to deserialize a variety of formats. - 它是泛型的, 不依赖于任何特定格式。It is generic and not tied to any particular format. 它可平均用于 CodeDOM 反序列化以及标记反序列化。It can be used equally for CodeDOM deserialization as well as markup deserialization. - 它是可扩展的, 并支持复制/粘贴和撤消/重做方案中使用的不同序列化方法。It is extensible and supports different serialization methods that are used in copy/paste and undo/redo scenarios. 与运行时对象序列化相比, 设计时序列化具有以下差异:Design-time serialization has the following differences from run-time object serialization: - 执行序列化的对象通常与运行时对象分离, 以便可以从组件中删除设计时逻辑。The object performing the serialization is generally separate from the run-time object, so that design-time logic can be removed from a component. - 序列化方案假设将创建完全初始化的对象, 并在反序列化过程中通过属性和方法调用对对象进行修改。The serialization scheme assumes the object will be created fully initialized, and then modified through property and method invocations during deserialization. - 不会序列化对象 (属性包含默认值) 上从未设置的值的对象的属性。Properties of an object that have values that were never set on the object (the properties contain the default values) are not serialized. 相反, 反序列化流可能具有孔洞。Conversely, the deserialization stream may have holes. - 强调在序列化流中的内容质量上, 而不是对象的完全序列化。Emphasis is placed on the quality of the content within the serialization stream, rather than the full serialization of an object. 这意味着, 如果没有定义的序列化对象的方式, 则可以跳过该对象, 而不是引发异常。This means that if there is no defined way to serialize an object, that object may be skipped rather than throwing an exception. 序列化引擎可以在此处提供试探法来确定哪些失败是可忽略的, 哪些失败是无法恢复的。The serialization engine may provide heuristics here to decide which failures can be ignored and which are unrecoverable. - 序列化流的数据可能比反序列化所需的数据多。The serialization stream may have more data than is needed for deserialization. 例如, 源代码序列化将用户代码与反序列化对象图所需的代码混合在一起。Source code serialization, for example, has user code mixed in with the code needed to deserialize an object graph. 此用户代码必须在反序列化时忽略, 并在序列化时保留。This user code must be ignored on deserialization and preserved on serialization. 由于存在这些差异, 因此不同的序列化模型适用于设计时序列化。Because of these differences, a different serialization model applies to design-time serialization. 此模型为要序列化的每个数据类型使用单独的序列化程序对象。This model utilizes a separate serializer object for each data type being serialized. 每个序列化程序都将其作为一个整体提供给问题。Each serializer provides its small contribution to the problem as a whole. 这些序列化程序通过一个公共序列化管理器进行协调。These serializers are all coordinated through a common serialization manager. 序列化管理器负责在这些不同的序列化程序之间维护状态。The serialization manager is responsible for maintaining state between these different serializers. 例如, 请看下面的类:As an example, consider the following class: [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializationManager.SampleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializationManager.SampleObject/CS/Program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializationManager.SampleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializationManager.SampleObject/VB/Program.vb#2)] 此类的实例将使用三个不同的序列化程序`SampleObject`: 一个用于, 一个用于字符串, 另一个用于整数。An instance of this class would utilize three different serializers: one for `SampleObject`, one for strings, and another for integers. 的序列化`SampleObject`程序被称为根序列化`SampleObject`程序, 因为是序列化关系图的根。The serializer for `SampleObject` is called the root serializer because `SampleObject` is the root of the serialization graph. 还可以创建更复杂的对象图。More complex object graphs can be created as well. 例如, 如果`SampleObject`已更改, 则会发生以下情况:For example, consider what would happen if `SampleObject` were changed as follows: [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializationManager.SampleObject#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializationManager.SampleObject/CS/SampleObject.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializationManager.SampleObject#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializationManager.SampleObject/VB/SampleObject.vb#11)] 这允许`SampleObject`具有作为自身的另一个实例的子。This allows `SampleObject` to have a child that is another instance of itself. 以下代码填充对象图:The following code fills in the object graph: [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializationManager.SampleObject#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializationManager.SampleObject/CS/SampleObject.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializationManager.SampleObject#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializationManager.SampleObject/VB/SampleObject.vb#12)] 序列`root`化后, 将使用四个序列化程序: 一个根序列化程序、一个用于`SampleObject`子`int`序列化程序的序列化程序、 `string`一个用于的序列化程序和一个序列化程序。When `root` is serialized, there will be four serializers used: one root serializer, one serializer for the child `SampleObject`, one serializer for `int`, and one serializer for `string`. 序列化程序根据类型进行缓存, 因此不需要为每个实例`SampleObject`创建序列化程序。Serializers are cached based on type, so there is no need to create a serializer for each instance of `SampleObject`. 类基于序列化会话的概念。The class is based on the idea of a serialization session. 会话维护可由各种序列化程序访问的状态。A session maintains state that can be accessed by the various serializers. 当释放会话时, 此状态将被销毁。When a session is disposed, this state is destroyed. 这有助于确保序列化程序在很大程度上保持不变, 并有助于清理已损坏的序列化程序。This helps to ensure that serializers remain largely stateless, and helps to clean up serializers that are have been corrupted. 下表说明如何在和会话之间管理状态。The following tables describe how state is managed in and among sessions. ## 全局状态Global State 此状态由序列化管理器对象拥有, 但与当前序列化会话无关。This state is owned by the serialization manager object, but is independent of the current serialization session. |对象Object|用法Usage| |------------|-----------| |序列化提供程序Serialization providers|对象可以将自己添加为自定义序列化提供程序。Objects can add themselves as custom serialization providers. 由于这些提供程序用于查找序列化程序, 因此它们会长于序列化会话。Because these providers are used to locate serializers, they outlive a serialization session.| ## 会话所有状态Session-Owned State 此状态由会话所有, 在销毁会话时销毁。This state is owned by a session and is destroyed when a session is destroyed. 因此, 如果序列化管理器不在活动会话中, 则访问任何操作此状态的属性或方法都将引发异常。Consequently, accessing any properties or methods that would manipulate this state will throw an exception if the serialization manager is not in an active session. |对象Object|用法Usage| |------------|-----------| | 事件 event|序列化程序会附加事件,以提供更多的名称解析。The event is attached by a serializer to provide additional resolution of names. 当会话终止时, 所有处理程序都将从此事件中分离。All handlers are detached from this event when a session terminates.| | 事件 event|此事件恰好在释放会话前引发。The event is raised just before a session is disposed. 然后, 所有处理程序都与此事件分离。Then, all handlers are detached from this event.| |名称表Name table|序列化管理器维护一个表, 该表在对象和其名称之间进行映射。The serialization manager maintains a table that maps between objects and their names. 序列化程序可以提供对象名以方便识别。Serializers may give objects names for easy identification. 会话终止时, 将清除此名称表。This name table is cleared when the session terminates.| |序列化程序缓存Serializer cache|序列化管理器维护已要求提供的序列化程序的缓存。The serialization manager maintains a cache of serializers it has been asked to supply. 当会话终止时, 此缓存会被清除。This cache is cleared when the session terminates. 可以随时安全地调用公共方法, 但仅当从会话内调用公共方法时, 才会缓存它的值。The public method can safely be called at any time, but its value is cached only if it is called from within a session.| |上下文堆栈Context stack|序列化管理器维护一个名为上下文堆栈的对象, 您可以使用属性访问该对象。The serialization manager maintains an object called the context stack, which you can access with the property. 序列化程序可以使用此堆栈来存储可供其他序列化程序使用的其他信息。Serializers can use this stack to store additional information that is available to other serializers. 例如, 序列化属性值的序列化程序可以在请求要序列化的值之前推送序列化堆栈上的属性名称。For example, a serializer that is serializing a property value can push the property name on the serialization stack before asking the value to serialize. 当会话终止时, 将清除此堆栈。This stack is cleared when the session is terminated.| |错误列表Error list|序列化管理器维护在序列化过程中发生的错误的列表。The serialization manager maintains a list of errors that occurred during serialization. 此列表可通过属性进行访问, 在会话终止时将被清除。This list, which is accessed through the property, is cleared when the session is terminated. 在会话之间访问属性将导致异常。Accessing the property between sessions will result in an exception.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果序列化程序请求序列化管理器无法满足的服务, 则默认实现会将这些请求转发到`provider`参数。If a serializer requests services that cannot be satisfied by the serialization manager, the default implementation will forward those requests to the `provider` parameter. 此构造函数将和属性设置`true`为。This constructor sets the and properties to `true`.

summary.span: 获取或设置该序列化管理器的容器。

span.span: Gets or sets to the container for this serialization manager.

value.span: 序列化管理器将向其添加组件的 。

span.span: The to which the serialization manager will add components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果容器存在, 则序列化管理器创建的所有组件都将添加到容器中。If a container exists, all components that are created by the serialization manager will be added to the container. 此属性的默认实现将搜索服务提供程序 , 并使用设计器宿主提供的容器 (如果存在)。The default implementation of this property will search the service provider for an and use the container provided by the designer host, should one exist. 否则, 此属性将返回`null` , 且不会将任何组件添加到容器中。Otherwise, this property will return `null` and no components will be added to a container.

exception.span: 序列化管理器中有一个活动的序列化会话。

span.span: The serialization manager has an active serialization session.

summary.span: 创建类型的实例。

span.span: Creates an instance of a type.

returns.span: 由 指定的类型的新实例。

span.span: A new instance of the type specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当序列化程序尝试创建类型的实例时, 会调用此方法。This method is called by serializers when they attempt to create an instance of a type. 默认实现创建类型的新实例, 或者根据和属性的值返回现有的实例。The default implementation creates a new instance of the type, or it may return an existing instance depending on the values of the and properties. 方法使用反射来创建实例, 并对参数执行一些泛型转换以查找匹配的构造函数。 The method uses reflection to create instances and will perform some generic transformations on parameters to find a matching constructor.

exception.span: 不具有采用 中包含的参数的构造函数。

span.span: does not have a constructor that takes parameters contained in .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.IDisposable CreateSession() cil managed

summary.span: 创建新序列化会话。

span.span: Creates a new serialization session.
An that represents a new serialization session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化管理器内的大多数数据是暂时性的, 只是在序列化会话的生存期内。Most data within the serialization manager is transient and only lives for the life of a serialization session. 当释放会话时, 序列化将被视为已完成, 并且此暂时性状态将被清除。When a session is disposed, serialization is considered to be complete and this transient state is cleared. 这允许使用序列化管理器的单个实例序列化多个对象树。This allows a single instance of a serialization manager to be used to serialize multiple object trees. 某些状态, 包括服务提供程序以及添加到序列化管理器的任何自定义序列化提供程序, 跨越会话。Some state, including the service provider and any custom serialization providers that were added to the serialization manager, span sessions.

exception.span: 序列化管理器已经在一个会话中。

span.span: The serialization manager is already within a session.

exception.span: 这一版的 不支持同时会话。

span.span: This version of does not support simultaneous sessions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化会话处于活动状态时, 你只能读取 "错误列表"。You can only read the error list while a serialization session is active.

span.span: This property was accessed outside of a serialization session.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写时, 请确保调用基类的方法, 以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写时, 请确保调用基类的方法, 以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool PreserveNames { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.PreserveNames : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指示 方法是否应该检查容器中是否存在给定名称。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the method should check for the presence of the given name in the container.

value.span: 如果 将传递给定组件名称，则为 。如果 将检查容器中是否存在给定名称，则为 。

span.span: if will pass the given component name; if will check for the presence of the given name in the container.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定方法的行为。 The property determines the behavior of the method. 如果`true`为 , 则将传递给定的组件名称。If `true`, will pass the given component name. 如果`false`为 , 则将检查容器中是否存在给定的名称。If `false`, will check for the presence of the given name in the container. 如果容器中不存在该名称, 将使用给定的名称。If the name does not exist in the container, will use the given name. 如果容器中存在该名称, 则在将其添加到容器时, 将会传递一个 null 值作为组件的名称, 从而为其提供一个新名称。If the name does exist in the container, will pass a null value as the name of a component when adding it to the container, thereby giving it a new name. 此第二种变化有助于实现始终复制对象的序列化程序, 而不是假定这些对象不存在。This second variation is useful for implementing a serializer that always duplicates objects, rather than assuming those objects do not exist. 粘贴命令通常使用这种类型的序列化程序。Paste commands often use this type of serializer. 如果不在序列化会话中, 则只能更改此属性。You can only change this property when you are not in a serialization session.

exception.span: 该属性已在序列化会话中发生更改。

span.span: This property was changed from within a serialization session.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ PropertyProvider { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };
member this.PropertyProvider : obj with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取应该用于为序列化管理器的 属性提供属性的对象。

span.span: Gets the object that should be used to provide properties to the serialization manager's property.

value.span: 应该用于为序列化管理器的 属性提供属性的对象。

span.span: The object that should be used to provide properties to the serialization manager's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供了一种向序列化管理器提供一组序列化属性的方法, 序列化程序可以使用这些属性来引导其行为。The property provides a way to give the serialization manager a set of serialization properties that serializers can use to guide their behavior. 将检查此对象的公共属性, 并将其包装在具有序列化管理器目标对象的新属性说明符中。This object's public properties will be inspected and wrapped in new property descriptors that have a target object of the serialization manager.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RecycleInstances { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.RecycleInstances : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 是否始终创建类型的新实例。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether will always create a new instance of a type.

value.span: 如果 将返回现有实例，则为 。如果 将创建类型的新实例，则为 。

span.span: if will return the existing instance; if will create a new instance of a type.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性为`false`, 则该方法将始终创建类型的新实例。 If the property is `false`, the method will always create a new instance of a type. 如果为`true` ,将首先在名称表和容器中搜索同名的对象。If is `true`, will first search the name table and container for an object of the same name. 如果此类对象存在并且具有相同的类型, 则将返回现有的实例。If such an object exists and is of the same type, will return the existing instance. 此第二种变体适用于实现将序列化状态应用于现有对象集的序列化程序, 而不是始终创建新树。This second variation is useful for implementing a serializer that applies serialization state to an existing set of objects, rather than always creating a new tree. **Undo**命令通常使用这种类型的序列化程序。The **Undo** command often uses this type of serializer. 在属性为`true`的情况下, 属性将根据两个对象的类型进一步修改的行为。In the case where the property is `true`, the property will further modify the behavior of depending on the types of the two objects.

exception.span: 序列化管理器中有一个活动的序列化会话。

span.span: The serialization manager has an active serialization session.

param.span: 要添加的序列化提供程序。

summary.span: 向序列化管理器添加自定义的序列化提供程序。

span.span: Adds a custom serialization provider to the serialization manager.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用方法请求序列化提供程序时, 序列化管理器将先查询自定义序列化提供程序, 然后再在该类型的元数据中查找相应的序列化程序。When the method is used to request a serialization provider, the serialization manager queries the custom serialization providers first before looking in the type's metadata for the appropriate serializer.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property Context As ContextStack Implements IDesignerSerializationManager.Context

summary.span: 获取该序列化会话的上下文堆栈。

span.span: Gets the context stack for this serialization session.
A that stores data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 上下文堆栈提供作为堆栈实现的用户定义的存储区域。A context stack provides a user-defined storage area, implemented as a stack. 此存储区域是一种提供跨序列化程序的通信的有用方法, 因为序列化是一种一般的层次结构。This storage area is a useful way to provide communication across serializers, as serialization is a generally hierarchical process.

exception.span: 对该属性的访问是在序列化会话的外部进行的。

span.span: This property was accessed outside of a serialization session.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.ReportError(object errorInformation) cil managed
Sub ReportError (errorInformation As Object) Implements IDesignerSerializationManager.ReportError

param.name: errorInformation
param.span: 包含错误信息的对象，其类型通常为 或 。

span.span: An object containing the error information, usually of type or .

summary.span: 用于报告序列化中可以恢复的错误。

span.span: Used to report a recoverable error in serialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化程序可以通过使用错误信息调用方法来适当地处理可恢复的错误。Serializers can be written to handle recoverable errors gracefully by calling the method with the error information. 序列化管理器可能会在错误完成后支持报告错误列表, 也可能会引发此方法中的异常并中止序列化过程。The serialization manager may support reporting a list of errors after it completes, or it may throw an exception from this method and abort the serialization process. 调用此函数后, 序列化程序应继续。The serializer should continue after calling this function. 将参数添加到集合中。 `errorInformation` adds the `errorInformation` parameter to the collection. 如果`errorInformation` 为`null`, 则不执行任何操作。If `errorInformation` is `null`, no action is taken.

exception.span: 对该属性的访问是在序列化会话的外部进行的。

span.span: This property was accessed outside of a serialization session.

MemberSignature.Value: Custom Event ResolveName As ResolveNameEventHandler Implements System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager

summary.span: 当 无法在序列化管理器的名称表中找到指定名称时发生。

span.span: Occurs when cannot locate the specified name in the serialization manager's name table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法时将引发事件,但无法在序列化管理器的名称表中找到`ResolveName`指定的名称。The `ResolveName` event is raised when the method is called, but it fails to find the specified name in the serialization manager's name table. 此事件为序列化程序提供了一种请求创建对象的方法, 以便序列化程序不必按依赖关系对对象创建进行排序。This event provides a way for a serializer to demand-create an object so the serializer does not have to order object creation by dependency. 序列化或反序列化完成后, 会立即清除此委托。This delegate is cleared immediately after serialization or deserialization is complete.

exception.span: 序列化管理器没有活动的序列化会话。

span.span: The serialization manager does not have an active serialization session.

MemberSignature.Value: Custom Event SerializationComplete As EventHandler Implements System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager

summary.span: 在序列化完成时发生。

span.span: Occurs when serialization is complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常, 序列化过程是单线程的, 应是无状态的。Typically the serialization process is single-threaded and should be stateless. 如果这些特性不为 true, 则可以使用事件来帮助组织进程。When these characteristics are not true, the event can be used to help to organize the process. 序列化程序可以跟踪此事件, 以了解序列化过程已完成。A serializer can track this event to know that the serialization process is complete. 例如, 序列化程序有时需要写入另一个文件, 如资源文件。For example, sometimes a serializer needs to write to another file, such as a resource file. 在这种情况下, 将序列化程序设计为在完成后关闭文件是低效的, 因为对象图的序列化通常需要多个序列化程序;因此, 资源文件将被打开并关闭多次。In such a case, it would be inefficient to design the serializer to close the file when it is finished because serialization of an object graph generally requires several serializers; therefore, the resource file would be opened and closed many times. 相反, 可以通过跟踪事件的对象访问资源文件, 并且该对象可以在序列化结束时关闭资源文件。Instead, the resource file could be accessed through an object that tracked the event, and that object could close the resource file at the end of serialization. 在相关的使用中, 此事件可用于删除序列化管理器中安装的临时服务。In a related use, this event can be used to remove a temporary service installed in the serialization manager.

exception.span: 序列化管理器没有活动的序列化会话。

span.span: The serialization manager does not have an active serialization session.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ValidateRecycledTypes { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ValidateRecycledTypes : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 方法是否验证匹配的名称表示同一类型。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the method will verify that matching names refer to the same type.

value.span: 如果 验证类型，则为 ；否则，如果不验证类型，则为 。

span.span: if verifies types; otherwise, if it does not.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性为时 `true`, 属性将修改方法的行为, 如下表中所述。 The property modifies the behavior of the method when the property is `true`, as detailed in the following table. |`RecycleInstances`|`ValidateRecycledTypes`|的行为`CreateInstance`Behavior of `CreateInstance`| |------------------------|-----------------------------|----------------------------------| |`false`|`true` 或 `false``true` or `false`|始终创建指定类型的新实例Always create a new instance of the specified type| |`true`|`false`|如果找到匹配的实例, 则返回该实例, 而不考虑其类型。If a matching instance is found it is returned, regardless of its type.| |`true`|`true`|如果找到匹配的实例, 则仅当其类型与方法调用中指定的类型相同时, 才返回该实例。If a matching instance is found, it is returned only if its type is the same as specified in the method call.| 对于将一种类型的对象变形到另一种类型的对象非常有用, 但它们具有相似的属性, 但不共享公共父级或接口。 is useful for morphing one type of object to another if they have similar properties but share no common parent or interface.

exception.span: 序列化管理器中有一个活动的序列化会话。

span.span: The serialization manager has an active serialization session.
